_comment: This data is an early work-in-progress and contains errors. Produced by @michaelh at Discuss and Discover SuttaCentral forum - please get in touch! Finished code forthcoming.

The wishes, desires, and hopes of the br: To live at home with their children
To use sandalwood imported from Kāsi
To wear garlands, perfumes, and makeup
To be reborn in a good place, a heavenly realm
The explanation of the Dhamma that appli: Reflecting on not killing living creatures
Reflecting on not committing sexual misconduct
Reflecting on not using divisive speech
Reflecting on not using harsh speech
The good qualities and desirable states: Ethical conduct loved by the noble ones leading to immersion
